mlx.core.DtypeCategory
**********************

class DtypeCategory(value, names=None, *values, module=None, qualname=None, type=None, start=1, boundary=None)

   Type to hold categories of "dtypes".

   * "generic"

     * bool_

     * "number"

       * "integer"

         * "unsignedinteger"

           * uint8

           * uint16

           * uint32

           * uint64

         * "signedinteger"

           * int8

           * int32

           * int64

       * "inexact"

         * "floating"

           * float16

           * bfloat16

           * float32

         * "complexfloating"

           * complex64

   See also "issubdtype()".

   __init__(*args, **kwds)

   -[ Attributes ]-

   +------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
   | "complexf  |                                                                                            |
   | loating"   |                                                                                            |
   +------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
   | "floating" |                                                                                            |
   +------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
   | "inexact"  |                                                                                            |
   +------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
   | "signedin  |                                                                                            |
   | teger"     |                                                                                            |
   +------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
   | "unsigned  |                                                                                            |
   | integer"   |                                                                                            |
   +------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
   | "integer"  |                                                                                            |
   +------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
   | "number"   |                                                                                            |
   +------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
   | "generic"  |                                                                                            |
   +------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
